gobblin.writer

Class AvroHdfsDataWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.writer.FsDataWriter<org.apache.avro.generic.GenericRecord>
      • gobblin.writer.AvroHdfsDataWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gobblin.util.FinalState, gobblin.writer.DataWriter<org.apache.avro.generic.GenericRecord>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class AvroHdfsDataWriter
extends FsDataWriter<org.apache.avro.generic.GenericRecord>
    An extension to FsDataWriter that writes in Avro format in the form of GenericRecords.

    This implementation allows users to specify the CodecFactory to use through the configuration property ConfigurationKeys.WRITER_CODEC_TYPE. By default, the deflate codec is used.
